StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [SelectFoldersForSec.on]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @Sec.onId uniqueiden..er ) AS
SELECT si.[Sec.onItemId], si.[Sec.onId], si.[FriendlyName], si.[Sec.onItemType] FROM [ACP].[Sec.onItem] si WHERE si.[Sec.onId] = @Sec.onId AND si.[Sec.onItemType] = 1 ORDER BY [SortOrder]
-- 1 = Folder, see Sec.onItemType table for lookup values
